titleStmt.title: SII 8.53: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 53. (A.R. No. 465 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ Avaniyāḷappiṟantārāṉa śrīkopperuñciṅkadevarkku yāṇṭu muṉṟāvatu nāḷ Eṇpattoṉṟu coḻako ṉolai . teṉṉavaṉ pirammārāyarum maturāntaka viḻupparaiyarum Uṭaiyār
tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrīmāheśvarak kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum cikāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum cāmutāyañ ceyvārkaḷum koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvārkaḷum paṇṭārappottaka muṭai
yārkaḷum kaṇakkarum kaṇṭu viṭutantatāvatu . vikkiramaciṅkapurattu melpuṟattil ceyvitta Āḷiyār tiruttoppil maraṅkaḷāĀkkavum Ittiruttoppil palākkāy vāḻaikkāy paḻaṅkaḷ Uḷḷiṭṭaṉa tirumaṭaippaḷḷi
p paṇṭārattukku mutalāka Eṭukkavum toppukkuṭikaḷāka Aimpatu Āḷ mutalkoḷḷavum Ivāḷukku Iraṇṭumāvāka nūṟumā nilam Ivvūr Eriyālum mutalaipāṭiEriyālum nīrpāyum nilattile muṉṟāvatu ĀṉimāĀ
ta mutal Aṭaittuk kuṭukkappaṇṇuva teṉṟu tevar tiruveḻuttuccāttiṉa tirumukam vantamaiyil Āḷiyārtiruttop peṉṉum perāl ceyta tiruttoppukku nāṟpatteṭṭu Āḷum Iraṇṭu nāyakamum Āka Aimpatu Āḷ
muṉṟāvatu nāḷ Eḻupatumutal mutalkoḷḷavum Ipperkku Ilakkaikkum koṟṟukkum cerkkacciyaṉ kamukutirunantavaṉak kuṭikaḷ peṟṟuvarukiṟapaṭiye nāyakapper Iraṇṭukku koṟṟukku per Oṉṟukku nāḷ Oṉṟukku muk
kuṟuṇiyāka vanta nellum puṭavaimutal Āṭṭaikkup perāl muṉṟāka vanta kācum per nāṟpatteṇvarkku koṟṟukkup per Oṉṟukku nāḷ Oṉṟukku patakkāka vanta nellum puṭavaimutal Āṭṭaikkup perāl Iraṇ
ṭāka vanta kācum Innāḷmutal peṟṟu Ittiruttoppil maraṅkaḷumākki Ittiruttoppil palākkāy vāḻaikkāy paḻaṅkaḷ Uḷḷiṭṭaṉa tirumaṭaippaḷḷip paṇṭārattukku mutalāka Eṭukkavuṅ kaṭavarkaḷākavum I
varkaḷukkuk koṟṟukkuṭaiya nellukkum puṭavaimutal kācukku kācu Oṉṟukku patiṉaiṅkalappaṭiyāl vanta nellukkum Ivvūril Iṭṭa nilam nūṟumāvum Ivarkaḷukku Aṭaittukkuṭukkavum Ippaṭikkuk kulot
tuṅkacoḻaṉ tirumāḷikaip puṟavāyile kalveṭṭavuṅ kaṭavatākavum paṇṇuvate . Ivai coḻakoṉ Eḻutteṉṟu vanta Evaṟtiṭṭiṉpaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 8.53 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
